title: nerf baron
body: as full item maxed out yi i cant solo baron which is broken and totally unfair if im so fucking pro i can pentakill with yi then i should be able to solo baron so nerf it.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=themagicalballs1,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UOhhIEEE,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-11-16T20:09:32.486+0000)
>
>  if im so fucking pro i can pentakill with yi 

Oh please....dont call yourself pro if you can pentakill with yi
I got a pentakill once with yi, and was not even aware of it until about 5 seconds afterwards. It was a sort of "lol, what? oh, huh.." moment.

Weeeell Yi can totally solo baron with a bit of lifesteal if I recall correctly, also baron is not supposed to be soloed, he's a team objective so the fact that some champs can solo it means it should be buffed against solo aggressors instead of nerfed.
